verses.verse: For <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G5484>cause<s%> I <S%G3972>Paul,<s%> the <S%G1198>prisoner<s%> of <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ<s%> for you <S%G1484>Gentiles,<s%>
<S%G1489>If<s%> you have <S%G191>heard<s%> of the <S%G3622>dispensation<s%> of the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> is <S%G1325>given<s%> me to <S%G1519>you-ward:<s%>
How that by <S%G602>revelation<s%> he <S%G1107>made<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> to me the <S%G3466>mystery;<s%> (as I <S%G4270>wrote<s%> <S%G4270>before<s%> in <S%G3641>few<s%> words,
<S%G4314>Whereby<s%> <S%G3739><s%> when you <S%G314>read,<s%> you <S%G1410>may<s%> <S%G3539>understand<s%> my <S%G4907>knowledge<s%> in the <S%G3466>mystery<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ)<s%>

<S%G3739>Which<s%> in <S%G2087>other<s%> <S%G1074>ages<s%> was not <S%G1107>made<s%> <S%G1107>known<s%> to the <S%G5207>sons<s%> of <S%G444>men,<s%> as it is <S%G3568>now<s%> <S%G601>revealed<s%> to his <S%G40>holy<s%> <S%G652>apostles<s%> and <S%G4396>prophets<s%> by the <S%G4151>Spirit;<s%>

That the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> should be fellow <S%G4789>heirs,<s%> and of the <S%G4954>same<s%> <S%G4954>body,<s%> and <S%G4830>partakers<s%> of his <S%G1860>promise<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> by the <S%G2098>gospel:<s%>

<S%G3739>Whereof<s%> I was <S%G1096>made<s%> a <S%G1249>minister,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1431>gift<s%> of the <S%G5485>grace<s%> of <S%G2316>God<s%> <S%G1325>given<s%> to me by the <S%G1753>effectual<s%> <S%G1753>working<s%> of his <S%G1411>power.<s%>

To me, who am <S%G1647>less<s%> than the <S%G1647>least<s%> of <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G40>saints,<s%> is <S%G3778>this<s%> <S%G5485>grace<s%> <S%G1325>given,<s%> that I should <S%G2097>preach<s%> <S%G1722>among<s%> the <S%G1484>Gentiles<s%> the <S%G421>unsearchable<s%> <S%G4149>riches<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ;<s%>

And to <S%G5461>make<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> men <S%G5461>see<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is the <S%G2842>fellowship<s%> of the <S%G3466>mystery,<s%> <S%G3588>which<s%> from the beginning of the <S%G165>world<s%> has been <S%G614>hid<s%> in <S%G2316>God,<s%> <S%G3588>who<s%> <S%G2936>created<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> things by <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ:<s%>

To the <S%G2443>intent<s%> that <S%G3568>now<s%> to the <S%G746>principalities<s%> and <S%G1849>powers<s%> in <S%G2032>heavenly<s%> places might be <S%G1107>known<s%> by the <S%G1577>church<s%> the <S%G4182>manifold<s%> <S%G4678>wisdom<s%> of <S%G2316>God,<s%>
<S%G2596>According<s%> to the <S%G165>eternal<s%> <S%G4286>purpose<s%> <S%G3739>which<s%> he <S%G4160>purposed<s%> in <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> our <S%G2962>Lord:<s%>
In <S%G3739>whom<s%> we <S%G2192>have<s%> <S%G3954>boldness<s%> and <S%G4318>access<s%> with <S%G4006>confidence<s%> by the <S%G4102>faith<s%> of him.
<S%G1352>Why<s%> I <S%G154>desire<s%> that you <S%G1573>faint<s%> not <S%G1722>at<s%> my <S%G2347>tribulations<s%> for you, <S%G3748>which<s%> is your <S%G1391>glory.<s%>
For <S%G5127>this<s%> <S%G5484>cause<s%> I <S%G2578>bow<s%> my <S%G1119>knees<s%> to the <S%G3962>Father<s%> of our <S%G2962>Lord<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G5547>Christ,<s%>
Of <S%G3739>whom<s%> the <S%G3956>whole<s%> <S%G3965>family<s%> in <S%G3772>heaven<s%> and <S%G1093>earth<s%> is <S%G3687>named,<s%>

That he would <S%G1325>grant<s%> you, <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G4149>riches<s%> of his <S%G1391>glory,<s%> to be <S%G2901>strengthened<s%> with <S%G1411>might<s%> by his <S%G4151>Spirit<s%> in the <S%G2080>inner<s%> <S%G444>man;<s%>
That <S%G5547>Christ<s%> may <S%G2730>dwell<s%> in <S%G5216>your<s%> <S%G2588>hearts<s%> by <S%G4102>faith;<s%> that you, being <S%G4492>rooted<s%> and <S%G2311>grounded<s%> in <S%G26>love,<s%>

May be <S%G1840>able<s%> to <S%G2638>comprehend<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G40>saints<s%> <S%G5101>what<s%> is the <S%G4114>breadth,<s%> and <S%G3372>length,<s%> and <S%G899>depth,<s%> and <S%G5311>height;<s%>

And to <S%G1097>know<s%> the <S%G26>love<s%> of <S%G5547>Christ,<s%> which <S%G5235>passes<s%> <S%G1108>knowledge,<s%> that you might be <S%G4137>filled<s%> with <S%G3956>all<s%> the <S%G4138>fullness<s%> of <S%G2316>God.<s%>

<S%G1161>Now<s%> to him that is <S%G1410>able<s%> to <S%G4160>do<s%> <S%G5228>exceeding<s%> <S%G1537>abundantly<s%> <S%G4053><s%> <S%G5228>above<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> that we <S%G154>ask<s%> <S%G2228>or<s%> <S%G3539>think,<s%> <S%G2596>according<s%> to the <S%G1411>power<s%> that <S%G1754>works<s%> in us,

To him be <S%G1391>glory<s%> in the <S%G1577>church<s%> by <S%G5547>Christ<s%> <S%G2424>Jesus<s%> <S%G1519>throughout<s%> <S%G3956>all<s%> <S%G1074>ages,<s%> <S%G165>world<s%> without <S%G165>end.<s%> <S%G3588><s%> <S%G281>Amen.<s%>
